resources.string: Google officially announced its much-anticipated Pixel phones; the Pixel XL, on October 4. We attended Google London UK event miroring the main one taking place In San Francisco US Where the firm unwrapped the new Android 7.1 Nougat devices which will apparently usurd Google long standing Nexus series.
5.0 inches\n FHD AMOLED at 441ppi\n 2.5D Corning Gorila Glass 4

2,770 mAh battery
 Standby time (LTE): up to 19 days
 Talk time (3g/WCDMA): up to 13 hours
 Internet use time (Wi-Fi): up to 13 hours
 Internet use timr (LTE): up to 13 hours
 Video playback: up to 13 hours
 Audio playback: (via headset): up to 110 hours
 Fast charging: up to 7 hours of use from only 15 minutes of charging
